|cpu1chip1 = Rockchip;RK3399; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_cores2 = 4 |cpu1_total_cores = 6 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A72 |cpu1_type2 = ARM |cpu1_type2_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.8 GHz <!-- 1.4 / 2.0 GHz --> |cpu1spd2 = 1.5 GHz<!-- 1.4 / 2.0 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->

|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8211E; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0 (Type C), USB 2.0, eMMC module connector, PCIe (non-standard connector), Micro SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 2 |exp_usb_num = 5 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->

|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot, HDMI 2.0, eDP, MIPI DSI, MIPI CSI, MIPI CSI/DSI, RTC w/ battery, IR receiver |addchip = 4-port USB 2.0 Hub Controller;Terminus Technology;FE1.1;;1;,,, Power Management IC w/RTC;Rockchip;RK808-D;;1;,,, Programmable USB Type-C Controller w/PD;ON Semi;FUSB302;;2;,,, 2.8-22V 3A 4-Switch Integrated Buck-Boost Converter;MPS;MP8859;;1;,,, 18V 3A Synchronous Step-Down DC/DC Converter;Richtek;RT6214B;;1;,,, Fixed 3.3V-8A Synchronous Buck Converter w/100mA LDO;MPS;NB680;;1;,,, 5.5V 6A 2.4MHz Synchronous Step Down Regulator;Silergy;SYR837;;1;,,, 5.5V 6A 2.4MHz Synchronous Step Down Regulator;Silergy;SYR838;;1;,,, 1A 1.5MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator;Silergy Corp;SY8088;;2;,,, 6V 2.5A Low Loss Power Distribution Switch;Silergy Corp;SY6282;;1;,,, 5.5V 2A Low Loss Power Distribution Switch;Silergy Corp;SY6280;;3;,,, 4-Line Uni-directional Transient Voltage Suppressor;Will Semiconductor;ESD5304D;;9; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = T-Chip |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 09/25/2018 |estprice = 99 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Also marketed as Libre Computer Renegade Elite
"Firefly", "ROC-RK3399-PC-V1.1-A", "Libre Computer" and "2018-09-25" are silkscreened on the board.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Rockchip]]'' RK3399 Dual-Core ARM Cortex-A72 (@1.8GHz) :+ Quad-Core ARM Cortex-A53 (@1.5GHz) *GPU: ''Mali-T864'' (OpenGL ES3.1, OpenVG1.1, OpenCL, DX11, AFBC) :VPU (with 4K VP9 and 4K 10-bit H265/H264 decoding) *Memory: 4GB (SDRAM) LPDDR4 *Storage: 4MB SPI Flash, TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet *USB: 1x USB 3.0 port, 1x USB 3.0 OTG port, 3x USB 2.0 ports *Expansion: Available expansion board offering :1x M.2 NGFF E-Key, 1x M.2 NGFF M-Key and optional PoE *Power Source: USB Type-C supporting USB PD 2.0
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Firefly ROC-RK3399-PC Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Firefly ROC-RK3399-PC Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
